articles.author: Paul Moore
articles.title: Met Eireann forecaster shares European heatwave latest as hot weather system hits continent - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Thermal gradients are having an impact on Ireland's weather
articles.content: Met Eireann has said that the current heatwave that mainland Europe is experiencing will not have a direct impact on Ireland, it has contributed to the recent unsettled conditions the country has exp… [+1789 chars]
